content:
I think I've got it! Thanks for the tips on creating a donor recognition page. I'll make sure to keep it simple, easy to navigate, and up-to-date. I'll also make sure to get permission from donors before listing their names and amounts, and respect their preferences for anonymity or specific recognition levels.

Now, I'd like to ask about creating a fundraising team. What are the benefits of having a fundraising team, and how can I go about recruiting team members?
